s: Spending more on a grill from a brand like Weber could save you money, as it'll last longer. ... We get it: Spending a couple of hundred bucks on a gas grill sounds appealing. Especially when cheap ones tend to throw in a whole bunch of extras (Side burners! Lights! Rotisseries!).
